info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 7:11PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Moffat and central Rio Blanco Counties through 745 PM MDT... At 710 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 24 miles southwest of Craig to near Meeker to 33 miles north of Rifle to 24 miles southeast of Rangely. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Meeker, Axial and Loyd. This includes the following highways... Colorado 13 between mile markers 25 and 72. Colorado 64 between mile markers 64 and 73. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
